name: Honorable Combatant
entries: At 3rd level, you become a practitioner of fisticuffs. Your unarmed strikes deal {@dice 1d4} bludgeoning damage, and while raging, your unarmed attacks deal an additional {@dice 1d4} damage. Your unarmed strikes can be lethal. Furthermore, you can add your Charisma Modifier to your Initiative Bonus.
At 7th level, your bonus damage increases to {@dice 2d4}, at 11th level it increases to {@dice 3d4}, and at 15th level, it increases to {@dice 4d4}.
